statements: SELECT * FROM historical_market_data;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, market_date, closing_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, opening_price, closing_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE market_date = '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume < 5000 ORDER BY closing_price DESC, market_date ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, highest_price, lowest_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE opening_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT instrument_name, closing_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE market_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE instrument_id = 1001;
SELECT instrument_name, opening_price, closing_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE market_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY closing_price DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, highest_price, lowest_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, date FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 50000 AND close_price < 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT algorithm_name, pnl FROM trading_algo_results WHERE success = true ORDER BY pnl DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND close_price > 100 ORDER BY symbol DESC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(close_price) AS max_price FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT algorithm_name, AVG(pnl) AS avg_pnl FROM trading_algo_results WHERE backtest_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY algorithm_name HAVING avg_pnl > 5000 ORDER BY avg_pnl DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date ASC, close_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data JOIN trading_algo_results ON historical_market_data.symbol = trading_algo_results.algorithm_name WHERE pnl >= 10000 AND success = TRUE ORDER BY pnl DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT date, open, close FROM historical_data WHERE symbol='MSFT' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, high, low FROM historical_data WHERE date='2022-10-15';
SELECT symbol, date, pnl FROM backtest_results WHERE strategy_id=1 AND pnl > 1000 ORDER BY pnl DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT date, symbol, close FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, date, high, low FROM historical_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY strategy_id
SELECT symbol, date, pnl FROM backtest_results WHERE result_id > 100 ORDER BY pnl DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM historical_data JOIN backtest_results ON historical_data.symbol = backtest_results.symbol AND historical_data.date = backtest_results.date ORDER BY historical_data.date
SELECT * FROM instrument WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, symbol FROM instrument WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, date, high, low FROM price_data WHERE instrument_id = 3 AND date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT description FROM trade_strategy WHERE id = 1;
SELECT instrument_id, date, action, quantity FROM trade_history WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM instrument;
SELECT name, symbol FROM instrument WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM price_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT instrument.name, price_data.close FROM price_data JOIN instrument ON price_data.instrument_id = instrument.id WHERE price_data.close > 100;
SELECT trade_strategy.name, trade_history.quantity, trade_history.price FROM trade_strategy JOIN trade_history ON trade_strategy.id = trade_history.strategy_id WHERE trade_history.action = 'BUY';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT company_name, sector FROM stock_metadata WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ';
SELECT symbol, split_factor FROM stock_splits ORDER BY split_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_dividends WHERE dividend > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, company_name, sector FROM stock_metadata WHERE exchange='NYSE' AND sector='Technology';
SELECT symbol, dividend FROM stock_dividends WHERE ex_dividend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
